items.title: Lisbon Funicular Crash: What to Know About Cause and Victims
items.description: At least 16 people were killed after the Glória funicular, one of the city’s most popular tourist attractions, crashed.

items.title: Portugal Searches for Cause of Lisbon Funicular Crash as Death Toll Rises

items.title: Whistle-Blower Complaints Detail Tension Over Vaccines at N.I.H.
items.description: Two former agency leaders said the administration’s “hostility” toward vaccines had spread to the agency’s top ranks.

items.title: Giorgio Armani’s Life in Photos
items.description: One of the most prolific fashion designers in history, he turned a certain kind of Italian chic into an international phenomenon.
